TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 提供程式碼給頁面剖析器，以指派控制項上的屬性值。

span.span: Provides code to the page parser for assigning property values on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別建立程式碼來執行網頁時，擷取資源的值。The class creates code to retrieve resource values when the page is executed. 資源檔通常會包含特定語言或文化特性的當地語系化資訊。A resource file typically contains information localized for a particular language or culture. 資源運算式的形式`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`頁面內。A resource expression takes the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>` within the page. 一部分的冒號 （:） 前後的運算式指定的運算式產生器使用，類型和冒號後面的部分表示的類別名稱和資源索引鍵。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression builder to use, and the part after the colon signifies the class name and resource key. 上述運算式會擷取名為的檔案的下列值`ClassKey.resx`:The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from a file named `ClassKey.resx`: ``` Hello! ``` 當頁面剖析器遇到與運算式`Resources`前置詞，它會建立的執行個體類別。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `Resources` prefix, it creates an instance of the class. 類別評估的運算式，或產生程式碼以執行頁面時，傳回運算式的值。The class either evaluates the expression or generates code to return a value for the expression when the page is executed. 如果運算式中的頁面，將會編譯發生物件產生資源檔中擷取指定的值的程式碼。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified value from the resource file. 如果運算式中的頁面，不會被轉譯時，發生物件會傳回從資源檔的值剖析頁面時。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the resource file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取資源檔中的預設貨幣。The following code example retrieves the default currency from a resource file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 這段程式碼會讀取名為資源檔中的下列值`Financial.resx`App_GlobalResources 目錄中。This code reads the following value from a resource file named `Financial.resx` in the App_GlobalResources directory. ``` US dollars ```

span.span: The parsed expression contains the class name and resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式的運算式時，會呼叫這個方法`<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>`發生在使用無編譯功能的網頁。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>` is encountered in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 它會從索引鍵/值組中的資源檔擷取適當的值。It retrieves the appropriate value from a key/value pair in a resource file.

span.span: Returns a code expression to evaluate during page execution.
A that invokes a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 建立期間呼叫這個方法的頁面或控制項。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 傳回的物件屬於下列類型和代表當頁面執行期間擷取資源的值時要呼叫的方法。The object returned is of the type and represents the method to call when retrieving a resource value during page execution.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出是否可在使用無編譯功能的頁面中評估運算式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否方法已經在類別中實作。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必須在運算式中使用無編譯功能的網頁要評估運算式產生器實作。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 在未編譯的頁面中，支援的資源值的評估，因此這個屬性一律會傳回`true`。 supports evaluation of resource values in non-compiled pages, so this property always returns `true`.

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview
